posts.title: I Read the Journal-American Today, Oh Dear: Beatles Files Part 2
posts.text: I have been working in the Music Division since 1997 and have been a Beatles fan since I was ten years old.  So, over the years, I have made an effort to keep track of any new Beatles’ related material that we acquire.  The Music Division, like the theatre division, also has extensive clipping and photo files.

posts.title: Advertising Through Marching: Sheet Music at LPA
